name: Pixel Tanks - Battle City Maze
description:
Enemy tanks occupied our territory! It looks like beginning of a new world war - you have to assume command and push out invaders from our territory. Their army is really powerful, they have a lot of tanks and soldiers. Show your strategy skills, defeat the enemy and win the war! Meet Pixel Tanks - Battle City Maze – amazing tank battle in a real labyrinth!

You control your soldiers – tank drivers - from the air and give orders. Your main goal is to help them to shoot all the enemies and dodge enemy shots. Control your tank, explore the labyrinth, and control your health indicator. We wish you good luck in this blitz campaign!

Pixel Tanks - Battle City Maze game features:
- Old school style graphics;
- Amazing tanks battle;
- Different tanks’ types and colors;
- Stunning gameplay;
- Different maze levels.

Will you lose or win this tank fight? Are you brave enough to let your tank drive into the maze swarm with shooting enemy tanks? Of course, yes! Pixel Tanks - Battle City Maze – you are alone, but you are the strongest!
